segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on her task, she doesn't see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is making a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so adventurous, climbing up to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried about him, that stool looks like it's going to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so sweet, waiting for her cookie like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the water yet, it's everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, I wish I was out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just spreading all over the floor, it's going to be a big mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get in trouble for taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really reaching, he must be determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman finishes her task soon and notices the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
